title: Preview of a New Typeface Posted, and our latest discount offer!
content:
Greater Albion Typefounders have just posted a preview of our next major forthcoming release 'Crewekerne' on our [blog](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015101118/http:/gatf.wordpress.com/). Crewekerne (nicknamed in house the font with the four e's) explores further the idea of 'Arts and Crafts' movement inspired faces that also inspired our recent Gildersleeve family.

We've also just posted details of a special introductory offer on the Gildersleeve family on the [blog](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015101118/http:/gatf.wordpress.com/).

The other release we currently have in the pipeline is something a little more formal-Bonnington. Watch this space!
author: Rasendyll
